00045   class Event : public ReferenceCount {
00046 
00047   public:
00048 
00049     enum Type { CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED, DISCONNECT, MESSAGE, ERROR, TIMER };
00050 
00066     Event(Type ct, int cid, struct sockaddr_in &a, int err=0, Header::HeaderT *h=0) 
00067       : type(ct), addr(a), connId(cid), error(err), header(h) {
00068       if (h != 0) {
00069         message = ((uint8_t *)header) + header->headerLen;
00070         messageLen = header->totalLen - header->headerLen;
00071         if (header->gid != 0)
00072           threadGroup = ((uint64_t)connId << 32) | header->gid;
00073         else
00074           threadGroup = 0;
00075       }
00076       else {
00077         message = 0;
00078         messageLen = 0;
00079         threadGroup = 0;
00080       }
00081     }
00082 
00088     Event(Type ct, int err=0) : type(ct), error(err) {
00089       header = 0;
00090       message = 0;
00091       messageLen = 0;
00092       threadGroup = 0;
00093       connId = 0;
00094     }
00095 
00098     ~Event() {
00099       delete [] header;
00100     }
00101 
00105     Type type;
00106 
00108     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00109 
00111     struct sockaddr_in localAddr;
00112 
00114     int connId;
00115 
00119     int error;
00120 
00122     Header::HeaderT *header;
00123 
00125     uint8_t *message;
00126 
00128     size_t messageLen;
00129 
00138     uint64_t threadGroup;
00139 
00145     std::string toString();
00146 
00149     void display() { cerr << toString() << endl; }
00150   };
